## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

If the asset stores a creation date in a form the system can convert to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDate], the metadata item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/dateValue] property contains a valid date. Otherwise, the creation date is available only as a string that you retrieve by calling the metadata item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/stringValue] property.

# creationDate

**Type Property**

A metadata item that indicates the creation date of an asset.

## Declaration

```swift
static var creationDate: AVAsyncProperty<Root, AVMetadataItem?> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

If the asset stores a creation date in a form the system can convert to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDate], the metadata item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/dateValue] property contains a valid date. Otherwise, the creation date is available only as a string that you retrieve by calling the metadata item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/stringValue] property.

This property may be `nil`.

## Loading metadata

- **metadata**: The metadata items that an asset contains for all metadata identifiers.
- **commonMetadata**: The metadata items that an asset contains for common metadata identifiers.
- **availableMetadataFormats**: The formats of metadata that an asset contains.
- **loadMetadata(for:completionHandler:)**: Loads an array of metadata items that the asset contains for the specified format.
- **lyrics**: The lyrics of the asset in a language suitable for the current locale.
